channel.name: DICOM with Orthanc PACS server
channel.description:
1. Import this channel to local Iguana instance 2. Launch this channel 3. Open Internet Browser window to "URL path" in "From HTTPS" Source component configuration page. 4. Follow instructions on 'Configuration for WADO implementation example' web page.
Prerequisite for Iguana 6.0.5 and later: Loading iNTERFACEWARE's dicom_raw.dll may require to have mscvrt120.dll installed on your Windows OS. "Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013" can be downloaded from https://www.microsoft.com/en-ca/download/details.aspx?id=40784
